name: When We Were Young
description: beautiful tune from the latest album. well worth a listen.

name: Rolling In The Deep
description: get ready to regret when you broke Adele's heart, you foolish, foolish man.

name: Adam's Apple
description: great riff with Aerosmith's classic rock goodness.

name: Only Love
description: I'll never forget walking into a New York hotel lobby, hearing the breathtaking interlude for this tune, and running to my hotel room while I desperately tried to remember the words and look this one up. I adore it.

name: Caught A Glimpse
description: One of the most inventive rock songs ever recorded. Still stands the test of time.

name: Christmas Lights
description: So simple. One of my favorite holiday tunes to enjoy with a nice evening cup of tea and a good book.

name: Goodbye Yellow Brick Road
description: Elton works his magic on the piano with great band orchestration bringing a difficult musical composition into an accessible sound.

name: Fu-Gee-La
description: Mid-nineties rap at its finest. Enjoy

name: Killing Me Softly
description: One of the most beatiful diva voices on one of the most beautiful tunes.

name: Hurt
description: Trent Reznor was one-upped when Cash touched his famous tune. The man in black's career encapsulated in a single song.

name: Tunnel Vision
description: Timberlake's best record to date. Smart samples with great beats and Justin especially on point

name: These Walls
description: To Pimp... was the album of the year for 2015. Sorry Swifties. It was great. This tune is the tip of the iceberg.

name: The End
description: This tune began a great southern rock album with a little irony.

name: Need You Now
description: Had to get atleast one radio hit in the database. I don't care if it's cheesy. It's a good tune.

name: It Never Entered My Mind
description: The movie, Runaway Bride introduced me to this one. You can steal it for a hot date. Guaranteed results.

name: (Teach You How To) Sing The Blues
description: If you've never seen the Lemy documentary, go watch it. Now. Grandfather of metal brings it.

name: Here In America
description: Close your eyes and be inspired by the basics of faith that make it beautiful for many.

name: Love
description: This 'Kiss Me' band was blessed and cursed by that hit. It overshadowed some incredible tunes

name: If The House Burns Down Tonight
description: This is my current psych-up song. The San Diego surfers bring it again

name: Real Thing
description: If you want to broaden your sonic horizons, check this one out. It shouldn't work, but it does.

name: Every Breaking Wave
description: This song was performed on U2's recent tour in acoustic version, but the original is worth a listen. So good.

name: Every Breaking Wave
description: This song was performed on U2's recent tour in acoustic version, but the original is worth a listen. So good.

name: Acrobat
description: This lesser known hit from the Irishmen shows a depth that often is overlooked after so many hits.

name: Even Better Than The Real Thing
description: U2 took this remake of their hit song and it became a live staple on the 360 Tour.
